==Trivia==
*{{w|Mazatán, Chiapas|Mazatán}} is a {{w|Municipalities of Chiapas|municipality}} in the {{w|Mexico|Mexican}} state of {{w|Chiapas}}, whose name comes from Pre-Hispanic origin meaning "place of many deers."
